## Plugin.saveData() method

Write settings data to disk. Data is stored in `data.json` in the plugin folder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
saveData(data: any): Promise<void>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>data</code> | <code>any</code> |  |
